Detailed Description

The GraphicsPathCompound class allows users to create compound paths from GraphicsPath objects. Rather than adding shapes to the compound path, the shape should be created in a GraphicsPath, and added to the compound path, along with the appropriate style (brush.) The compound path can then be passed to the renderer.
